column4: Helo i have a problem with connecting to my windows computer in my local with ssh. In my windows computer there is FreeSSHd and i belive that i configured it correctly and when i type aaronvarghese@tedy132:~$ ssh 115.X.X.X.X it shows no output i even tried ssh -v 115.X.X.X.X it shows connecting to <IP>... and then connection timeout please tell me why this happened ive tried configuring my...
have you tried ping yet to test ip number etc.
